content: As an AI language model, I don't have personal experiences as humans do. However, some popular yoga poses that are great for overall body strength and flexibility include Downward-Facing Dog, Warrior II, Triangle Pose, Tree Pose, and Child's Pose. These poses can help increase strength, balance, flexibility, and mindfulness. It's always a good idea to consult a qualified yoga teacher or instructor for proper guidance and modifications, especially if you're new to yoga.
